title: Rising Agricultural Sector and Green Initiatives Fuel Adoption of CTO Derivatives in Bio-Based Products - Yahoo Finance
summary: The global Crude Tall Oil (CTO) Derivative market is projected to grow significantly in the coming years, driven by rising demand for sustainable bio-based products and increased adoption in various industries. CTO derivatives are produced as a by-product of the pulp and paper industry and offer several benefits, including renewable sourcing, lower carbon footprint, and diverse applications.

title: Sustainability in co-working: Environmentally-friendly initiatives in shared workspaces - Cyprus Mail
summary: Co-working spaces are becoming increasingly sustainable by adopting eco-friendly practices. These spaces are implementing initiatives like using energy-efficient appliances, installing renewable energy sources, and promoting community gardens.
